stories.headline: Driving the big CAR
stories.summary: The article discusses the importance of introducing Computer-Assisted Reporting (CAR) in small newspapers, emphasizing that CAR is not only for big papers but can be beneficial for smaller newsrooms as well.

stories.headline: Case Dismissed
stories.summary: An investigative team explores if local law enforcement keeps its promise to enforce DUI laws by examining case dismissals when police fail to appear in court.
